channel.title: [STILL NEED HELP!] Can't run EasyRSC/Noobscape
channel.description:
So I've got my new computer here and I can run other servers that I have, but I can't seem to run EasyRSC or Noobscape. I could on my old laptop, but not now =/ I'm sure it has to have something to do with ant because my others run fine but they don't use ant.
I've got JDK and the paths all set, as well as the environment variables done... anything I'm forgetting? Whenever I click 'compile server' or 'run server', I just get CMD for a sec and it shuts like right away.
Any suggestions?

item.title: [STILL NEED HELP!] Can't run EasyRSC/Noobscape
item.dc:creator: @Miles1 Miles`
item.description:
@Miles1 wrote:

Read what it says, put @pause at the end of the .bat when you run it and it should stay popped up. If not then your variables aren’t set correctly I believe.

Read full topic

item.title: [STILL NEED HELP!] Can't run EasyRSC/Noobscape
item.dc:creator: @Sworddude247 Sworddude247
item.description:
@Sworddude247 wrote:

There was already a pause there, so I tried running and same thing. Then I tried adding another pause, same thing. Same thing when I run ant.bat and my server.

Read full topic

item.title: [STILL NEED HELP!] Can't run EasyRSC/Noobscape
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

go to where ever your apache-ant is located at and open ant.bat and go to end of the file and put a “pause” after “:omega”

Read full topic

item.title: [STILL NEED HELP!] Can't run EasyRSC/Noobscape
item.dc:creator: @Sworddude247 Sworddude247
item.description:
@Sworddude247 wrote:

Sorry forgot to include this. It says there’s a syntax error each time =/
Same thing if I just go into cmd and type ‘ant -version’ or even just ‘ant’.

Read full topic

item.title: [STILL NEED HELP!] Can't run EasyRSC/Noobscape
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Every time you have a problem like this, just put a ‘pause’ at the end of your .bat scripts so the command prompt stays up, then you can read the error and go from there. You obviously aren’t going to get very far guessing at how to fix it.

Read full topic

item.title: [STILL NEED HELP!] Can't run EasyRSC/Noobscape
item.dc:creator: @Sworddude247 Sworddude247
item.description:
@Sworddude247 wrote:

So I’ve got my new computer here and I can run other servers that I have, but I can’t seem to run EasyRSC or Noobscape. I could on my old laptop, but not now =/ I’m sure it has to have something to do with ant because my others run fine but they don’t use ant.

I’ve got JDK and the paths all set, as well as the environment variables done… anything I’m forgetting? Whenever I click ‘compile server’ or ‘run server’, I just get CMD for a sec and it shuts like right away.
